content: **linnie** is a seamless cardigan knit utilising the top down raglan shaping method it is perfect if you wish to destash some sock yarn lying around somewhere in your house - **size ** newborn/1 month the measurements of finished garment are chest - approx 40 cm/15 75 around length - approx 23 cm/9 from shoulder to bottom sleeves - approx 12 cm/5 from underarm **yarn ** main color regia silk 4-ply - about 250 m/270 y or any other solid fingering weight yarn contrasting color noro kureyon sock for yoke and cuffs - about 100 m/120 y or any other variegated fingering weight yarn e g drops delight **needles ** us 4 - 3 25 mm circular dpns - optional for sleeves or appropriate size to get gauge **other notions ** -waste yarn -stitch markers -3 buttons **gauge after blocking ** 26 sts x 34 row = 10 cm 4 in stockinette stitch take time to save time check your gauge **errata ** i updated the pattern and changed the instructions for buttonholes a little this is how they go now row 4 - girl version *k until 1 st before marker m1r k1 sm k1 m1l* repeat from * 3 times more knit until 4 sts and make first buttonhole k2tog yo k2 row 4 - boy version k2 yo k2tog *k until 1 st before marker m1r k1 sm k1 m1l* repeat from * 3 times more knit until the end they should be better especially if you decide to make buttonholes all the way down the front --- please bear in mind that the pattern has not been tested so if you encounter any mistakes feel free to contact me any time i d be more that happy to help you and get feedback from you
